meanings.sent1: The swordplayers practiced their moves diligently.
meanings.sent2: The swordplayers gathered at the training ground every evening.
meanings.sent3: The swordplayers accidentally bumped into each other during practice.
meanings.sent4: The swordplayers' dedication to their craft was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The swordplayers' skills shone brightly during the tournament.

meanings.definition: a group of individuals who participate in sword fighting
meanings.sent1: Every weekend, the swordplayers met for friendly duels.
meanings.sent2: The local community admired the swordplayers' bravery.
meanings.sent3: The swordplayers' enthusiasm for combat was infectious.
meanings.sent4: The swordplayers' unity was their greatest strength.
meanings.sent5: The swordplayers' camaraderie was evident in every battle.

meanings.definition: those who wield swords in a performance or competition
meanings.sent1: The swordplayers dazzled the audience with their choreographed fights.
meanings.sent2: The theater was filled with applause for the swordplayers' skills.
meanings.sent3: The swordplayers' dramatic gestures added flair to the show.
meanings.sent4: The swordplayers' movements were as graceful as dancers.
meanings.sent5: The swordplayers' costumes added to the spectacle of the performance.
